data.actual_result: Link is opened in a new popup window (the kind that browsers open for live chat or whatever, where mostly everything is disabled, no bookmarks bar, etc.). Middle-clicking to open in a new tab does work properly.
data.expected_result: Link opens in either a new tab or window, depending on the user's browser settings
data.short_description: Links on web canary build open in a new popup window, ignoring user's browser preferences
data.steps_to_repro: - Open canary version of Discord in browser - Click any external link (not images hosted on the CDN)
